price: "Si nos llegara el Mensaje como les llegó a los pueblos anteriores,
arabic: لَوۡ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكۡرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: law anna ʿindanā dhik'ran mina al-awalīna
